T

tail - Variable in class cds.java.project.concurrent.ConcurrentQueue
The current tail of our concurrent queue The volatile keyword guarantees that any thread that reads this member will see the most recently written value
takeGiftFromFactory() - Method in class cds.java.project.actors.Reindeer
Method trough which the reindeer tries to take a gift from the factory queue; its first task is to try to acquire the semaphore; itv waits to get it and then it pops a gift from the toy factory queue (it is a concurrent queue so it is ensured that at that time, no elf is trying to put a gift inside of it); finally, if he has finished packing the gift, it releases the semaphore
takeGiftFromPipe() - Method in class cds.java.project.actors.SantaClaus
Method that pops a gift from the pipe and stores it in the current gift memeber
toString() - Method in class cds.java.project.actors.ElfWorker
toString() method from the Object class is overridden in order to return the index of the factory where the elf is working, the number of the elf and the current position in which he resides
toString() - Method in class cds.java.project.actors.Reindeer
toString() method has been overridden in order to return the number of the reindeer and the toy factory from which it takes gifts in order to pack them and send them to Santa
toString() - Method in class cds.java.project.actors.SantaClaus
toString() method from Object has been overridden in order to return the number of gifts that Santa has in his bag
toString() - Method in class cds.java.project.gift.ChristmasGift
toString() method from the Object class has been overridden in order for it to return, after constructing it with a StringBuilder, a message; the message tells us the number of the gift, and whether it is unpacked or if it has already been packed by a reindeer
toString() - Method in class cds.java.project.grid.SimpleBooleanGrid
toString() method from the Object class has been overridden in order for it to return the length and height of the boolean grid
toString() - Method in class cds.java.project.grid.SimpleGrid
toString() method from the Object class has been overridden in order for it to return the length and height of the generic grid
toString() - Method in class cds.java.project.position.Position2D
toString() method has been overridden in order for it to return the position object formatted in a easy to understand way
toString() - Method in class cds.java.project.workshop.ToyFactory
toString() method from the Object class has been overridden in order for it to return the number of the factory and the grid size of the underlying matrix
ToyFactory - Class in cds.java.project.workshop
Implementation of a Santa Claus Toy Factory from the Workshop; this is achieved by extending the Thread class; this class does a lot of work: it spawns the elves, it decides their moves and supervises the gift creation process that is done by the elves; it contains a boolean grid, it uses a ReentrantLock to ensure that the movement of elves is correct and has a concurrent queue that plays the role of the deposit of gifts where all presents created by elves are stored awaiting for elves to take and afterwards pack and send them to Santa Claus trough a pipe; I have chosen to let each factory know the number of reindeer that will take gifts from them, and, to simplify a bit the structure of the program, the number of reindeer is 10 for each toy factory
ToyFactory(int) - Constructor for class cds.java.project.workshop.ToyFactory
First constructor of the Toy Factory has a parameter represented by the factory index that is thereby set; it also sets the factory grid size to a default value of 100 (minimum accepted), the number of working elves to 0, creates an empty factory grid, an empty working elves list, creates the lock that will be used later for synchronization and the concurrent queue of gifts; it also sets the number of reindeer to 10 for the current factory
ToyFactory(int, int) - Constructor for class cds.java.project.workshop.ToyFactory
Second constructor of the Toy Factory has two parameters represented by the factory index and the factory grid size; it sets the factory grid size, the number of working elves to 0, it creates an empty factory grid, an empty working elves list, the lock that will be used later for synchronization and the concurrent queue of gifts; it also sets the number of reindeer to 10 for the current factory
toyFactoryList - Variable in class cds.java.project.servicethreads.ElfStateGetter
List of all toy factories
